ygData.subject: RE: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Dell Inspiron 3600, and it works well.  A little sluggish when turning corners, but otherwise fine. ... From: Doug Sorensen
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Dell Inspiron 3600, and it works well. A little sluggish when
turning corners, but otherwise fine.

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 10:14 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] EQ and Laptops


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

The Dell Inspiron series has 3D acceleration and are
pretty reasonably priced. As long as they have
Direct3D drivers it should work fine.

Belgarth

--- MFerrulo@... wrote:
> From: MFerrulo@...
>
>
> I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a
> laptop so I can play while
> travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop?
> Is it possible? Any
> advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to
> get?
>
> I do not expect the performance of my desk top -
> just something playable :)
>
> Wizaro WrathCaster
> Solusek Ro
